subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramírez hit a tying, two-run homer in the eighth inning yesterday, Álex Cora had a go-ahead triple in the ninth and the Boston Red Sox got set for their first series against the Yankees by beating the Blue Jays in Toronto, 5-3.
snippet: Manny Ramírez hit a tying, two-run homer in the eighth inning yesterday, Álex Cora had a go-ahead triple in the ninth and the Boston Red Sox got set for their first series against the Yankees by beating the Blue Jays in Toronto, 5-3.
